name: Daily Treasure Hunter
description: Seek out hidden treasures and valuable artifacts.
Follow ancient maps to discover buried riches.
Brave dangerous guardians to claim your rewards.

dialogs.start1: Ah, a fellow seeker of fortune! I have maps to treasures hidden across the realm.
dialogs.player_interested: I'm ready to brave any danger for hidden treasures.
dialogs.complete1: Exceptional work! These treasures will make you rich beyond your dreams.
